mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM exinfo WHERE isShow = 'Y'

SELECT exino, exiecno, exiperson, exiname, exisdate, exiedate, exiprice, exiage, exiexpno, idir, imgname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, exino, exiecno, exiperson, exiname, exisdate, exiedate, exiprice, exiage, exiexpno, idir, imgname FROM ( SELECT exino, exiecno, exiperson, exiname, exisdate, exiedate, exiprice, exiage, exiexpno, idir, imgname FROM exinfo, image WHERE imgno = exino AND exinfo.isshow = 'Y' AND image.isshow = 'Y' ORDER BY exisdate DESC ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startCont} AND #{endCont}
